title: pixel 3a file transfer to pc - setup?
content: I don't have time to transfer images via google drive over wifi, which seems to be the prefered method as they don't provide a usb cable, so I bought one and pliugged it into the computer 0- the pixel 3a shows up in My Computer but nothing shows up. I don't get a message on my phone saying it has connected. i can't see where to get these 2 to speak to each other. Thought a wire would be a good clue for them both
